name: EXALOT developers
tagline: digital language for all agents, available to all humans, made by love (Open Source, Open Data, Open Knowledge) WWW: the Web We Want
body:
### Welcome to the EXALOT developers page.

The project is preparing it's first release. Until then the use and understanding of EXALOT might be tricky for a newcomer. If you are willing to contribute you are welcome to get a personal intro. Maybe you want to be an early bird. I am looking forward in any case!!

Here you see some EXALOT-syntax. Actually the most basic one, the EXALOT-core. Just to give you a taste.
```
[["undefined","defined"]],
[["defined","b"]],
[["b","x"],"defined"],
[["b","noo"],"undefined"],
```

### Support or Contact

Until the first release in autumn 2015 just contact me. Find out about me at my website: http://ernesto-sun.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
